text:
@realDonaldTrump Stop tweeting about coronavirus. You’re a liar and are only covering your ass bc you screwed this up so bad

You are limiting testing to keep the numbers down

You are blocking info dissemination from experts bc you don’t want America to hear the truth

#TrumpLiesAboutCoronavirus

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
